text: I am building a web application that has a real-time feed (similar to Facebook's newsfeed) that I want to update via a long-polling mechanism.
I understand that with Python, my choices are pretty much to either use Stackless (building from their Comet wsgi example) or Cometd + Twisted.
Unfortunately there is very little documentation regarding these options and I cannot find good information online about production scale users of comet on Python.
Has anyone successfully implemented comet on Python in a production system?
How did you go about doing it and where can I find resources to implement my own?
